resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107305</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107305</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206629</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Country Studies/Area Handbooks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Handbücher Des Land-Studies/Area</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Manuels du Pays Studies/Area</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Manuais Do País Studies/Area</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Manuali Del Paese Studies/Area</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτες χώρας/εγχειρίδια περιοχής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Manuales Del País Studies/Area</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents a description and analysis of the historical setting and the social, economic, political, and national security systems and institutions of countries throughout the world. It examines the interrelationships of those systems and the ways they are shaped by cultural factors.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt eine Beschreibung und eine Analyse der 
historischen Einstellung und der Sozial-, ökonomische, politische und
Staatssicherheit Systeme und der Anstalten der Länder weltweit dar. 
Es überprüft die Verwandtschaft jener Systeme und die 
Methoden, die sie durch kulturelle Faktoren geformt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présente une description et une analyse de la 
configuration historique et des systèmes de sécurité sociale, 
économique, politique, et nationale et des établissements des pays 
dans le monde entier. Lui examine les corrélations entre ces 
systèmes et les voies qu'elles sont formées par des facteurs 
culturels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresenta uma descrição e uma análise do ajuste
histórico e dos sistemas da segurança social, econômica, política,
e nacional e das instituições dos países durante todo o mundo. 
Examinam os interrelationships daqueles sistemas e as maneiras 
que é dado forma por fatores cultural.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presenta una descrizione e un'analisi della 
regolazione storica e dei sistemi di sicurezza sociale, economica, 
politica e nazionale e delle istituzioni dei paesi nel mondo intero. 
Esso esaminano le correlazioni di quei sistemi ed i modi che 
sono modellate dai fattori culturali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει μια περιγραφή και μια ανάλυση των 
ιστορικής συστημάτων τιμής τών παραμέτρων και κοινωνικής, 
οικονομικής, πολιτικής, και εθνικής ασφάλειας και των 
οργάνων των χωρών σε όλο τον κόσμο. Εξετάζει τις 
αλληλεξαρτήσεις εκείνων των συστημάτων και των τρόπων που 
διαμορφώνονται από τους πολιτιστικούς παράγοντες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presenta una descripción y un análisis de la 
configuración histórica y de los sistemas de la seguridad social, 
económica, política, y nacional y de las instituciones de países a 
través del mundo. Él examina las correlaciones de esos 
sistemas y las maneras que él es formado por factores culturales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206629</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107305</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/country-studies-area-handbooks</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
